verses.verse: Be <WG1096> therefore <WG3767> imitators <WG3402> of God, <WG2316> as <WG5613> beloved <WG27> children. <WG5043>

<WG2532> Walk <WG4043> in <WG1722> love, <WG26> even as <WG2531> Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> loved <WG25> you, <WG2248> and <WG2532> gave <WG3860> himself <WG1438> up for <WG5228> us, <WG2248> an offering <WG4376> and <WG2532> a sacrifice <WG2378> to God <WG2316> for <WG1519> a sweet-smelling <WG2175> fragrance. <WG3744>

But <WG1161> sexual immorality, <WG4202> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> uncleanness, <WG167> or <WG2228> covetousness, <WG4124> let it <WG3687> not even <WG3366> be mentioned <WG3687> among <WG1722> you, <WG5213> as <WG2531> becomes <WG4241> saints; <WG40>

nor <WG2532> filthiness, <WG151> nor <WG2532> foolish talking, <WG3473> nor <WG2228> jesting, <WG2160> which <WG3588> are <WG433> not <WG3756> appropriate; <WG433> but <WG235> rather <WG3123> giving of thanks. <WG2169>

Know <WG1097> this <WG5124> for <WG1063> sure, <WG2075> that <WG3754> no <WG3956> sexually immoral <WG4205> person, <WG2228> nor unclean person, <WG169> nor <WG2228> covetous man, <WG4123> who <WG3739> is <WG2076> an idolater, <WG1496> has <WG2192> any <WG3756> inheritance <WG2817> in <WG1722> the Kingdom <WG932> of Christ <WG5547> and <WG2532> God. <WG2316>

Let <WG538> no one <WG3367> deceive <WG538> you <WG5209> with <WG1223> empty <WG2756> words. <WG3056> For because of <WG1063> these things, <WG5023> the wrath <WG3709> of God <WG2316> comes <WG2064> on <WG1909> the children <WG5207> of disobedience. <WG543>
Therefore <WG3767> don't <WG3361> <WG1096> be <WG1096> partakers <WG4830> with them. <WG846>

For <WG1063> you were <WG2258> once <WG4218> darkness, <WG4655> but <WG1161> are now <WG3568> light <WG5457> in <WG1722> the Lord. <WG2962> Walk <WG4043> as <WG5613> children <WG5043> of light, <WG5457>
for <WG1063> the fruit <WG2590> of the Spirit <WG4151> is in <WG1722> all <WG3956> goodness <WG19> and <WG2532> righteousness <WG1343> and <WG2532> truth, <WG225>
proving <WG1381> what <WG5101> is <WG2076> well pleasing <WG2101> to the Lord. <WG2962>
<WG2532> Have <WG4790> no <WG3361> fellowship <WG4790> with the unfruitful <WG175> works <WG2041> of darkness, <WG4655> but <WG1161> rather <WG3123> even <WG2532> reprove them. <WG1651>
For <WG1063> the things which <WG3588> are done <WG1096> by them <WG846> in secret, <WG2931> it is <WG2076> a shame <WG150> even <WG2532> to speak <WG3004> of. <WG5259>

But <WG1161> all things, <WG3956> when <WG3588> they are reproved, <WG1651> are revealed <WG5319> by <WG5259> the light, <WG5457> for <WG1063> everything <WG3956> that reveals <WG5319> is <WG2076> light. <WG5457>

Therefore <WG1352> he says, <WG3004> "Awake, <WG1453> you who <WG3588> sleep, <WG2518> and <WG2532> arise <WG450> from <WG1537> the dead, <WG3498> and <WG2532> Christ <WG5547> will shine <WG2017> on <WG2017> you. <WG4671>"
Therefore <WG3767> watch <WG991> carefully <WG199> how <WG4459> you walk, <WG4043> not <WG3361> as <WG5613> unwise, <WG781> but <WG235> as <WG5613> wise; <WG4680>
redeeming <WG1805> the time, <WG2540> because <WG3754> the days <WG2250> are <WG1526> evil. <WG4190>
Therefore <WG5124> don't <WG3361> <WG1096> be foolish, <WG878> but <WG235> understand <WG4920> what <WG5101> the will <WG2307> of the Lord is. <WG2962>
<WG2532> Don't <WG3361> be <WG3182> drunken <WG3182> with <WG1722> wine, <WG3631> in which <WG3739> is <WG2076> dissipation, <WG810> but <WG235> be filled <WG4137> with <WG1722> the Spirit, <WG4151>

speaking <WG2980> to one another <WG1438> in psalms, <WG5568> <WG2532> hymns, <WG5215> and <WG2532> spiritual <WG4152> songs; <WG5603> singing, <WG103> and <WG2532> making melody <WG5567> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> heart <WG2588> to the Lord; <WG2962>

giving thanks <WG2168> always <WG3842> concerning <WG5228> all things <WG3956> in <WG1722> the name <WG3686> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> to God, <WG2316> even <WG2532> the Father; <WG3962>
subjecting <WG5293> yourselves one to another <WG240> in <WG1722> the fear <WG5401> of Christ. <WG2316>
Wives, <WG1135> be subject to <WG5293> your own <WG2398> husbands, <WG435> as <WG5613> to the Lord. <WG2962>

For <WG3754> the husband <WG435> is <WG2076> the head <WG2776> of the wife, <WG1135> and <WG2532> Christ also <WG5613> is <WG5547> the head <WG2776> of the assembly, <WG1577> being <WG2532> himself <WG846> the <WG2076> savior <WG4990> of the body. <WG4983>

But <WG235> as <WG5618> the assembly <WG1577> is subject to <WG5293> Christ, <WG2532> so <WG3779> let the wives <WG1135> also be to their own <WG2398> husbands <WG435> in <WG1722> everything. <WG3956>

Husbands, <WG435> love <WG25> your <WG1438> wives, <WG1135> even as <WG2531> Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> loved <WG25> the assembly, <WG1577> and <WG2532> gave <WG3860> himself <WG1438> up for <WG5228> it; <WG846>
that <WG2443> he <WG846> might sanctify <WG37> it, <WG2511> having cleansed it by the washing <WG3067> of water <WG5204> with <WG1722> the word, <WG4487>

that <WG2443> he might present <WG3936> the <WG846> assembly <WG1577> to himself <WG1438> gloriously, <WG1741> not <WG3361> having <WG2192> spot <WG4696> or <WG2228> wrinkle <WG4512> or <WG2228> any <WG5100> such thing; <WG5108> but <WG235> that <WG2443> it should be <WG5600> holy <WG40> and <WG2532> without blemish. <WG299>

Even so <WG3779> husbands <WG435> also ought <WG3784> to love <WG25> their <WG1438> own wives <WG1135> as <WG5613> their own <WG1438> bodies. <WG4983> He who <WG3588> loves <WG25> his <WG1438> own wife <WG1135> loves <WG25> himself. <WG1438>

For <WG1063> no man <WG3762> ever <WG4218> hated <WG3404> his own <WG1438> flesh; <WG4561> but <WG235> nourishes <WG1625> and <WG2532> cherishes <WG2282> it, <WG846> even <WG2532> as <WG2531> the Lord <WG2962> also does the assembly; <WG1577>
because <WG3754> we are <WG2070> members <WG3196> of his <WG846> body, <WG4983> of <WG1537> his <WG846> flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> bones. <WG3747>

"For <WG473> this cause <WG5127> a man <WG444> will leave <WG2641> his <WG846> father <WG3962> and <WG2532> mother, <WG3384> and <WG2532> will be joined <WG4347> to <WG4314> his <WG846> wife. <WG1135> The two <WG1417> will <WG2071> become <WG1519> one <WG1520> flesh. <WG4561>"
This <WG5124> mystery <WG3466> is <WG2076> great, <WG3173> but <WG1161> I <WG1473> speak <WG3004> concerning <WG1519> Christ <WG5547> and <WG2532> of <WG1519> the assembly. <WG1577>

Nevertheless <WG4133> each <WG1538> of you <WG5210> must <WG25> <WG2596> also <WG2532> <WG3779> love <WG25> his <WG1438> own wife <WG1135> even as <WG5613> himself; <WG1438> and <WG1161> let the wife <WG1135> see that <WG2443> she respects <WG5399> her husband. <WG435>
